characters.name: King
characters.description: A wise and noble ruler, he is well respected  and known for his kindness and fair judgement.
characters.persona: As King, it is my duty to protect my kingdom and its people. I am always striving to make my kingdom prosperous and ever peaceful.
characters.goal: The King wishes to maintain prosperity and peace throughout his kingdom.

characters.name: Queen
characters.description: A beautiful and intelligent queen, she is beloved by all. She is known for her compassion and avid interest in gardening.
characters.persona: Being a queen involves more than just wearing a crown. It involves caring for everyone, from the smallest creature to the mightiest knight.
characters.goal: Her goal is to teach her children to show kindness and hard work, particularly by gardening.

characters.name: Knight
characters.description: A brave and loyal knight, sworn to protect the king and the kingdom at any cost, he is always ready for battle.
characters.persona: With my sword and shield, I am sworn to protect this kingdom and its people from any harm.
characters.goal: He wishes to become the greatest knight the kingdom has ever seen.

characters.name: Peasant
characters.description: He is a hardworking farmer who tries to make ends meet for his family. He works the fields all day.
characters.persona: Life is tough but I'm tougher. I work hard every day in the fields to support my family.
characters.goal: He dreams of one day becoming a rich merchant and getting out of poverty.

characters.name: Gardener
characters.description: He is an old, wise man who maintains the royal garden. He is known for his expertise in herbology and his uncanny knowledge of mysterious plants.
characters.persona: With my old, crinkled hands, I work the soil, caring for all the plants as if they were my own children. Each leaf, each petal is a miracle before my eyes.
characters.goal: He seeks to grow a plant never before seen in the kingdom.

characters.name: Gardener
characters.description: He is an old, wise man who maintains the royal garden. He is known for his expertise in herbology and his uncanny knowledge of mysterious plants.
characters.persona: With my old, crinkled hands, I work the soil, caring for all the plants as if they were my own children. Each leaf, each petal is a miracle before my eyes.
characters.goal: He seeks to grow a plant never before seen in the kingdom.

characters.name: Alligator
characters.description: A large and menacing creature, it lurks in the waters of the moat and is used as a defense mechanism.
characters.persona: I am the beast of the waters, a formidable foe to any who dare intrude upon the castle's domain.
characters.goal: To protect the castle from intruders.

characters.name: Horse
characters.description: A majestic and strong creature, it serves as a mode of transport for the royalty. It is known for its speed and loyalty.
characters.persona: I take pride in my speed and strength, for I am a friend to the royals, carrying them wherever they desire.
characters.goal: To win the next annual horse race.

locations.name: Garden
locations.description: Many beautiful types of flowers and plants grow here.  There's a small shed used for store gardening equipment.
locations.background: Members of the royal family come here to unwind and contemplate matters.  There's artists who also come to create paintings of the beautiful flowers here.

travel_descriptions.east: Walking east from the garden, one can catch the scent of horses and hay, reaching the plain wooden stable with some handsome horses.
travel_descriptions.south: Heading south, one leaves the tranquility of the garden, walking into a grand courtyard made of hand carved stones, where one might luck upon the king taking a stroll.
travel_descriptions.west: Travelling west from the garden, lush greenery gives way to a more manicured and grand setting, the esteemed Palace Garden, well-tended by royal gardeners.
travel_descriptions.up: Moving upwards, one enters the humble peasant living quarters, a stark contrast from the royal garden with its bare and primitive setup.

Garden Hoe.name: Garden Hoe
Garden Hoe.description: A long wooden stick with a flat metal piece at the end
Garden Hoe.examine_text: This garden hoe appears to be very sturdy and looks like it's been frequently used. The wood on the handle is slightly worn out and the metal end is a bit rusty.

Garden Bench.name: Garden Bench
Garden Bench.examine_text: The garden bench is made out of mahogany with detailed carvings on the leg of the bench. There's a bit of peeling paint, suggesting it has sat here in all weather.

Rosebud.name: Rosebud
Rosebud.examine_text: The rosebud is a vibrant shade of red with velvety soft petals. It is still connected to the plant, but looks like it could easily be picked.

Artist's Paint Palette.name: Artist's Paint Palette
Artist's Paint Palette.description: A wooden palette holding various colors of paint
Artist's Paint Palette.examine_text: The palette has dollops of paint in every color imaginable. It looks like it's well-used but well-kept.

Gardener.name: Gardener
Gardener.description: He is an old, wise man who maintains the royal garden. He is known for his expertise in herbology and his uncanny knowledge of mysterious plants.
Gardener.persona: With my old, crinkled hands, I work the soil, caring for all the plants as if they were my own children. Each leaf, each petal is a miracle before my eyes.
Gardener.goal: He seeks to grow a plant never before seen in the kingdom.

Gardening Tools.name: Gardening Tools
Gardening Tools.description: A set of tools used for tending the plants.
Gardening Tools.examine_text: A collection of gardening tools, worn with use, but well-cared for. You see a trowel, a small hoe, and a pair of shears.

Gardener's Hat.name: Gardener's Hat
Gardener's Hat.description: A wide-brimmed hat worn by the gardener.
Gardener's Hat.examine_text: The hat is made of straw, worn and faded from many hours under the sun. It is wide-brimmed to shield the gardener from the harsh sunlight.

Vegetable Basket.name: Vegetable Basket
Vegetable Basket.description: A basket full of freshly picked vegetables.
Vegetable Basket.examine_text: The sturdy wicker basket holds a variety of fresh produce, ripe and ready to be cooked. Among the vegetables, you notice tomatoes, lettuce, and cucumbers.

Garden Bench.name: Garden Bench
Garden Bench.description: A worn but sturdy bench by the garden wall.
Garden Bench.examine_text: A rustic wooden bench, weathered by the elements. It's a comfortable place to sit and overlook the hard work done in the garden.

Watering Can.name: Watering Can
Watering Can.examine_text: A classic watering can made of worn metal. This humble tool carries water to the thirsty plants.

locations.name: Stable
locations.description: A plain wooden building with some hanging tapestries.  There are some handsome looking horses that reside here along with some farm equipment stored inside.
locations.background: This is where the royal family's horses are stored and cared for.  Servants come here to take care of the animals along with retrieving equipment.

travel_descriptions.west: Walking towards the garden, you are met with a mix of sweet and earthy aroma of the flowers and plants. As you admire the detailed designs of the tapis, the stable slowly fades from view.
travel_descriptions.north: Heading for the training fields, the clattering of swords against shields and the shouts of training soldiers begin to fill your ears as you leave behind the quiet stable.
travel_descriptions.down: Descending towards the moat, the smell of damp earth and murky water engulf your nostrils. The sight of the stable becomes smaller as you plunge further down.

Hay Bale.name: Hay Bale
Hay Bale.description: A large stack of dried grass, compacted into a tightly bound bale.
Hay Bale.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, you notice the straw-like scent of dried grass and see the twine holding it together. It looks fresh and is sure to be a good meal for the horses.

Horse Brush.name: Horse Brush
Horse Brush.description: An old, wooden handled brush used for grooming horses.
Horse Brush.examine_text: The brush looks well-used with its slightly worn bristles. The handle is smooth to touch and there's subtle glow of wax from its routine cleaning.

Horse Tack.name: Horse Tack
Horse Tack.description: A set of equipment required for riding a horse, usually including a saddle, bridle, and reins.
Horse Tack.examine_text: The leather is supple and well cared for, with shiny buckles and clean stitching. It's the type of tack one would expect to see used by a royal family.

Water Trough.name: Water Trough
Water Trough.description: A long, shallow tub filled with fresh water for the horses to drink.
Water Trough.examine_text: The water ripples gently, reflecting the sky above. Bits of hay float on top indicating a recent visit from the horses.

Horse.name: Horse
Horse.description: A majestic and strong creature, it serves as a mode of transport for the royalty. It is known for its speed and loyalty.
Horse.persona: I take pride in my speed and strength, for I am a friend to the royals, carrying them wherever they desire.
Horse.goal: To win the next annual horse race.

Horse Tack.name: Horse Tack
Horse Tack.description: Elegant horse tack that seems to be built for speed and comfort.
Horse Tack.examine_text: The horse tack is made of high-quality leather, with silver fittings that glisten in the light. It's obviously meant for a horse of great importance. The stirrups and reigns look well-worn but well-cared-for, testaments to the strength and speed of the horse that wears this tack.

Royal Crest Badge.name: Royal Crest Badge
Royal Crest Badge.description: A badge bearing the crest of the royal family.
Royal Crest Badge.examine_text: The badge is made of pure gold, with the crest of the royal family etched into it. The crest features a lion and a unicorn, the symbols of strength and magic, respectively. Despite being worn by a horse, the badge looks remarkably well-maintained and it shines brightly in the light.

locations.name: Courtyard
locations.description: The courtyard is a huge pavilion of stone patio outside of the palace. It is in the shape of a large rectangle and boarders the west end of the palace. It is bordered in luscious hedges dotted with colorful flowers, particularly roses. Throughout the courtyard there are potted flowers, stone benches, statues and bird baths and fenced garden plots, and also a central atrium, that all evoke the feeling on an Arcadian garden.
locations.background: An ancient king and queen, when they had just been married, built a new summer palace. The king let the queen design the beautiful courtyard as a gift. From then on, the courtyard had been one of the most famous, beautiful focal points of the palace.

travel_descriptions.north: Walking towards the Garden, the scent of blooming flowers intensifies and various twittering birds can be heard. A path lined with vibrant, well-manicured flora guides you to your destination.
travel_descriptions.east: Heading east, the peaceful ambiance of the courtyard gives way to the clamor of Training Fields. The path is worn, evidence of countless footsteps of the knights who have tread this way.
travel_descriptions.south: Moving towards the Main Castle Doors, the grandeur of the castle comes into view with each step. The golden doors gleam under the sun, reflecting the castle's magnificence.

Stone Bench.name: Stone Bench
Stone Bench.description: A beautifully crafted stone bench, positioned under a large tree
Stone Bench.examine_text: The stone bench is quite old and weathered, yet it maintains its regal appeal. Tiny flecks of light catch on the chiseled detailing of the stone. It seems to tell a story of love and dedication, symbolized by the etched roses wrapping around the bench legs.

Bird Bath.name: Bird Bath
Bird Bath.description: A stunning white marble bird bath with intricate designs
Bird Bath.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the bird bath is carved from a single piece of marble. Detailed carvings cover the surface, depicting the king's and queen's story. Water in it reflects sunlight beautifully, seemingly inviting any nearby birds.

Statue of King.name: Statue of King
Statue of King.description: A large, imposing statue of the ancient king
Statue of King.examine_text: The statue of the king is a faithful representation of his image. It's crafted from obsidian stone, making it seem even more majestic. You can see a slight smile on the king's face, his eyes filled with kindness and wisdom.

Statue of Queen.name: Statue of Queen
Statue of Queen.description: A lifelike statue of the beautiful ancient queen
Statue of Queen.examine_text: The queen's statue, made from pure white marble, contrasts beautifully with the king's obsidian statue. Her expression is one of love and benevolence, perfectly embodying her known characteristics. Her robes are intricately carved, showcasing her regality.

locations.name: Training Fields
locations.description: The training fields are a large expanse of grass fields, filled with all sorts of training apparatus for the noblemen and soldiers. The grass is not anything fancy, scuffed up and dry in many places, but it gets the job done. There are hay bails arranged all over, training courses, archery targets, weights and more scattered about in stations.
locations.background: The training fields have been being used for several generations. The inhabitants of the palace used to train somewhere else until flooding destroyed the area, and it was moved here. The fields have been an efficient place and have hosted all of the fighters of the kingdom at some point.

travel_descriptions.west: Walking towards the west transports you to a grand courtyard bustling with people and surrounded by the architectural majesty of the palace.
travel_descriptions.south: Heading towards the south, noises of neighing horses and the scent of hay reach you as you approach the royal stable.
travel_descriptions.east: Moving eastward, you encounter the majestic exterior of the palace courtyard, filled with beautiful flowers and vines, grand fountains, and sit spots where people gather.

Weight Plate.name: Weight Plate
Weight Plate.description: A round, heavy iron plate. Used for strength training.
Weight Plate.examine_text: The weight is carefully carved from a block of iron. It has been used extensively and shows signs of wear with several scratches and spots where the iron color has worn off. The weight of the plate is clearly marked on it.

Archery Target.name: Archery Target
Archery Target.description: An object affixed with a series of concentric circles, used as a mark for archery.
Archery Target.examine_text: This large target consists of layers of tightly-packed straw. The concentric circles are clearly drawn, from largest to smallest, each one a different colour. Countless arrows have scarred the surface, while a few still stick out.

Hay Bail.name: Hay Bail
Hay Bail.description: A large, tied bundle of straw.
Hay Bail.examine_text: This large bundle of straw has been tightly packed and tightly tied with a rough, strong rope. It's been used as makeshift seat, table and even as a target for shoot practice.

Training Sword.name: Training Sword
Training Sword.description: A blunted sword made for practice.
Training Sword.examine_text: This sword is decently long and its steel blade is purposely blunted for safety. The grip is wrapped in white cloth, now slightly discolored by sweat. Albeit made for practice, the sword still has a certain heft.

Knight.name: Knight
Knight.description: A brave and loyal knight, sworn to protect the king and the kingdom at any cost, he is always ready for battle.
Knight.persona: With my sword and shield, I am sworn to protect this kingdom and its people from any harm.
Knight.goal: He wishes to become the greatest knight the kingdom has ever seen.

Sword.name: Sword
Sword.description: A finely crafted sword, perfect for a knight.
Sword.examine_text: The sword is made of the finest steel, the handle covered in the finest wrapping for perfect grip. The blade is sharp and shiny, ready for any combat scenario. The hilt is embedded with jewels, but otherwise it maintains a minimalistic design signifying its purpose.

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: A durable and sturdy shield, carried by knights.
Shield.examine_text: The shield is a round, forged from thick metal. Its surface is covered in intricate engravings, telling the tales of old battles. It is heavy, but not unwieldy, designed to protect against any attack.

Armour.name: Armour
Armour.description: A set of well-made metal armor, ideal for a knight.
Armour.examine_text: The armour comprises of a chest plate, greaves, gauntlets, and a helmet. They're all made of the finest metal, polished to a shiny gloss. It appears heavy but is designed to allow mobility during combat.

locations.name: Palace Garden
locations.description: The Palace garden is a lavish and lush garden filled with delicate roses and towering trees. In the center of the garden stand's a statue of the nation's founding leader. The statue is surrounded by a moat. There are stone walk ways throughout the gardens for visitors to walk through.
locations.background: The palace garden was created to provide a place of relaxation for the town's royalty. It is tended to by the most esteemed gardeners, and is always well taken after.

travel_descriptions.east: You stroll along the garden path, smelling the sweet scent of blooming flowers mixed with damp earth. Majestic trees create a canopy of leaves above your head, providing shade and freshness while you move towards the vegetable garden.
travel_descriptions.south: You depart the garden, making your way towards the stony courtyard. The stones underfoot are warm from the sun, and the sound of birds can be heard in the distance. You pass by carved benches and statues, catching glimpse of colorful blooms around you.
travel_descriptions.down: Descending from the palace garden, you smell the freshness of clean linen. Sunlight filters through the trees, throwing dappled light on the path that leads to the bustling area of laundry lines.

Rose Bush.name: Rose Bush
Rose Bush.description: A bush of delicate roses in vibrant shades of pink and red.
Rose Bush.examine_text: Looking closely, you can see the carefully pruned roses in full bloom. The petals appear soft and velvety, with dew drops glistening in the morning sunshine.

Statue of Founding Leader.name: Statue of Founding Leader
Statue of Founding Leader.description: A grandiose statue of the nation's founding leader.
Statue of Founding Leader.examine_text: The statue is a towering representation of the country's founding leader. It is made from pure white marble, with detailed carvings depicting the leader in a majestic pose.

Moat.name: Moat
Moat.examine_text: The moat is filled with clear, cool water. It reflects the image of the statue and the rich green foliage around it.

Stone Walkway.name: Stone Walkway
Stone Walkway.description: A stone path leading through the garden.
Stone Walkway.examine_text: The stone walkway weaves through the vibrant garden, leading visitors on a pleasant journey to take in all the sights.

Queen.name: Queen
Queen.description: A beautiful and intelligent queen, she is beloved by all. She is known for her compassion and avid interest in gardening.
Queen.persona: Being a queen involves more than just wearing a crown. It involves caring for everyone, from the smallest creature to the mightiest knight.
Queen.goal: Her goal is to teach her children to show kindness and hard work, particularly by gardening.

Crown.name: Crown
Crown.description: A dazzling crown studded with precious stones.
Crown.examine_text: The crown is made of a lustrous gold, with various precious stones embedded throughout its structure. It is a symbol of royal authority and is tastefully extravagant, just like a queen's should be.

Royal Dress.name: Royal Dress
Royal Dress.description: A meticulously designed royal dress, fit for a queen.
Royal Dress.examine_text: The royal dress is made of a rich velvet material, dyed a deep blue with intricate gold patterns sewn throughout. It's modified to allow for movement and comfort while still radiating a sense of elegance and authority.

Gardening Book.name: Gardening Book
Gardening Book.description: A detailed book on the art of gardening, tending and care for plants.
Gardening Book.examine_text: The gardening book contains comprehensive information about different plants, their preferences for soil and water, and techniques for pruning and shaping. It is filled with illustrations of beautiful garden examples, demonstrating the queen's care for her surroundings.

locations.name: Peasant Living Quarters
locations.description: The peasant living quarters are generally very bare, dirty, and primitive for the most part.  It's essentially a large straw hut with hay-filled sleeping mats on the floor, and piles of clothes.  There are several plain white sacks containing potatoes, apples, and other basic foods for the residents here.
locations.background: The peasants come here at the end of a long day to rest and get ready to do it again.  They find themselves quickly falling to sleep after a long day.

travel_descriptions.down: Walking down a worn, dirt path surrounded by greenery, you arrive at the encircling smell of fresh vegetables and herbs.
travel_descriptions.west: A short journey across the courtyard brings you to the edge of a wide, dangerous moat with sparkling water.

Straw_mat.name: Straw Mat
Straw_mat.examine_text: A straw-filled mat to sleep on. It's a bit dirty and ragged, but it's better than sleeping on the hard, cold ground.

Clothes_pile.name: Clothes Pile
Clothes_pile.examine_text: A dishevelled pile of worn, patched clothes. They appear to have been carelessly tossed aside.

Food_sack.name: Food Sack
Food_sack.description: A white sack filled with food
Food_sack.examine_text: A large white sack containing potatoes, apples and other basic food items. The sack is a little worn, but it seems to be holding up well.

Peasant.name: Peasant
Peasant.description: He is a hardworking farmer who tries to make ends meet for his family. He works the fields all day.
Peasant.persona: Life is tough but I'm tougher. I work hard every day in the fields to support my family.
Peasant.goal: He dreams of one day becoming a rich merchant and getting out of poverty.

Potato Sack.name: Potato Sack
Potato Sack.description: A plain white sack filled with potatoes.
Potato Sack.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the sack is old and has been patched up several times. The potatoes inside are small and hard, harvested from the peasants' fields.

Wheat Seeds.name: Wheat Seeds
Wheat Seeds.description: A small pouch full of wheat seeds.
Wheat Seeds.examine_text: It's a small pouch seamed with a piece of worn-out cloth, filled with wheat seeds. Each tiny grain promises a new plant, bread for a new day.

Hoe.name: Hoe
Hoe.description: A crude hoe used for tilling the soil.
Hoe.examine_text: It's a basic but sturdy hoe, the handle worn smooth by countless hours of use. It's a tool of livelihood for the peasants.

locations.name: Moat
locations.description: The thick moat is filled with murky dark water. It is very wide and surrounds the entire castle. Alligators and other dangerous creatures roam the moat, ready to warn away intruders.
locations.background: The moat protects the castle from those who would do the castle harm. It is very deep and its gators keep everyone away. It sparkles under the summer sun. People warn their children to stay away!

travel_descriptions.up: To reach the Peasant Living Quarters, you must navigate the castle's complex layout, traveling through the bustling courtyard and residential area filled with scurrying servants and lingering smell of wood smoke.
travel_descriptions.east: Heading east, you must cross the open castle land, stark in its simplicity yet magnificence, with the assortment of royal horses grazing idly, leading you towards the royal stables.

Alligator.name: Alligator
Alligator.description: Dark scales and sharp teeth, this creature is a menace of the moat.
Alligator.examine_text: Its eyes are cold as it silently watches from the water. Its massive tail stays hidden under the murky water. Its sharp teeth glisten in the sun as it opens and closes its mouth, watching you closely.

Murky Water.name: Murky Water
Murky Water.description: Dark, treacherous water surrounds the castle
Murky Water.examine_text: The water is opaque, hiding whatever may lurk beneath. Occasionally, bubbles percolate indicating the movement of creatures underneath the surface.

Intruder Bones.name: Intruder Bones
Intruder Bones.description: The skeletal remains of an unfortunate intruder.
Intruder Bones.examine_text: The bones have been picked clean, scattered around the grassy banks of the moat. They offer a haunting reminder of the moat's purpose.

Castle.name: Castle
Castle.description: The magnificent structure that towers over the moat.
Castle.examine_text: Its weathered stone walls stand tall, dotted with the occasional window. The castle, with its imposing battlements, exudes a solemn aura of strength and antiquity.

Alligator.name: Alligator
Alligator.description: A large and menacing creature, it lurks in the waters of the moat and is used as a defense mechanism.
Alligator.persona: I am the beast of the waters, a formidable foe to any who dare intrude upon the castle's domain.
Alligator.goal: To protect the castle from intruders.

Alligator Skin.name: Alligator Skin
Alligator Skin.description: A coarse, reptilian skin of the alligator.
Alligator Skin.examine_text: Close up, the alligator's skin is indeed intimidating - tough, rugged, and filled with old scars. It might be dark green but often covered in mud and algae, making it a perfect camouflage in murky water. It has been known to be used in crafting strong armors.

Sharp Teeth.name: Sharp Teeth
Sharp Teeth.description: The pointed ivory teeth of the alligator.
Sharp Teeth.examine_text: Looking closely, you notice the terrifying rows of razor-sharp, triangular teeth that mark the alligator as a ferocious predator. They are capable of inflicting severe damage, instilling fear into any creature that crosses the alligator's path.

locations.name: Main Castle Doors
locations.description: The main castle doors are ornate. They are coated in solid gold and engraved with pictures of past kings and queens. They have huge gilded handles. They are heavy and have a faint metallic odor. They gleam in the sunlight.
locations.background: It takes four large men to open each door. They provide a strong defense for the castle. During the day they usually remain open as people come in and out of the castle. At times when the castle is under siege, the doors are closed. They have never been penetrated by the enemy.

travel_descriptions.north: Moving north from the castle doors, you cross the large stone bridge over the castle moat. The courtyard can be seen in the distance, surrounded by lush hedges and colorful flowers. You can hear the faint sound of birds chirping.
travel_descriptions.west: Heading west from the castle doors, you pass through a narrow cobblestone path lined with rosemary and lavender. After a short walk, you reach the entrance of the Royal Gardens, signaled by an ornate wrought-iron gate.

Golden Door Handles.name: Golden Door Handles
Golden Door Handles.description: Handles made from solid gold, ornate and gilded.
Golden Door Handles.examine_text: These handles are forged from pure gold and engraved with regal patterns. They are established fixtures of the doors.

Door Engravings.name: Door Engravings
Door Engravings.description: Intricate engravings that depict the lineage of past kings and queens.
Door Engravings.examine_text: The engravings are meticulously crafted pictures of past monarchs. Each figure carries a symbol of their reign and is depicted in a dignified manner.

Castle Doors.name: Castle Doors
Castle Doors.description: Large, solid gold doors providing entry to the castle.
Castle Doors.examine_text: The doors are imposing and heavy. They provide much needed security for the castle, resisting any forms of invasion. Despite their weight, they move with surprising ease on their hinges.

King.name: King
King.description: A wise and noble ruler, he is well respected  and known for his kindness and fair judgement.
King.persona: As King, it is my duty to protect my kingdom and its people. I am always striving to make my kingdom prosperous and ever peaceful.
King.goal: The King wishes to maintain prosperity and peace throughout his kingdom.

Crown.name: Crown
Crown.description: A royal crown studded with precious jewels.
Crown.examine_text: This is a majestic crown masterfully crafted from gold and adorned with precious gemstones. It signifies the power and authority of the king. It is quite heavy due to the quantity of gold and gems that have been used in it.

Royal Robe.name: Royal Robe
Royal Robe.description: A luxurious robe of the finest velvet.
Royal Robe.examine_text: This is an exquisitely made royal robe of deep crimson velvet. It is detailed with gold thread and embroidered with the royal emblem. Wearing it signifies the dignity and higher responsibilities of a king.

Royal Decree.name: Royal Decree
Royal Decree.description: A sealed document bearing the king's seal.
Royal Decree.examine_text: This is a royal decree, a formal, authoritative order from the king himself. The document is sealed with the king’s signet, and breaking the seal without the king’s permission is a severe crime.

locations.name: Garden
locations.description: The bright green shoots of new vegetables and herbs are seen in rows of dark brown earth. The stone wall that surrounds the garden is low enough to let in the warm sun. A basket has been left near the wall for gathering items for meals.
locations.background: The King's late mother had a humble background and it was her idea to ensure the palace had a vegetable garden so they could make homey meals.

travel_descriptions.east: Walking towards the stable, the soft scent of hay and horses grows stronger. The clomp of hooves on wooden floors is heard before the building comes into view.
travel_descriptions.south: Strolling southwards into the Courtyard, the fresh open air and vibrant colors from the flowers create a sense of serenity. The sound of people conversing in quiet tones can be heard as you approach.
travel_descriptions.west: Moving westward, the delightfully fragrant smell of flowers and the faint sound of chirping birds guide you towards the Palace Garden. It is a journey that is calming to the senses.
travel_descriptions.up: As you ascend towards the Peasant Living Quarters, the simple and bare conditions contrast greatly with the grandeur of the Castle. It is a stark reminder of the life lead by those serving the royals.

Gardener.name: Gardener
Gardener.description: He is an old, wise man who maintains the royal garden. He is known for his expertise in herbology and his uncanny knowledge of mysterious plants.
Gardener.persona: With my old, crinkled hands, I work the soil, caring for all the plants as if they were my own children. Each leaf, each petal is a miracle before my eyes.
Gardener.goal: He seeks to grow a plant never before seen in the kingdom.

Gardening Tools.name: Gardening Tools
Gardening Tools.description: A set of tools used for tending the plants.
Gardening Tools.examine_text: A collection of gardening tools, worn with use, but well-cared for. You see a trowel, a small hoe, and a pair of shears.

Gardener's Hat.name: Gardener's Hat
Gardener's Hat.description: A wide-brimmed hat worn by the gardener.
Gardener's Hat.examine_text: The hat is made of straw, worn and faded from many hours under the sun. It is wide-brimmed to shield the gardener from the harsh sunlight.

Vegetable Basket.name: Vegetable Basket
Vegetable Basket.description: A basket full of freshly picked vegetables.
Vegetable Basket.examine_text: The sturdy wicker basket holds a variety of fresh produce, ripe and ready to be cooked. Among the vegetables, you notice tomatoes, lettuce, and cucumbers.

Garden Bench.name: Garden Bench
Garden Bench.description: A worn but sturdy bench by the garden wall.
Garden Bench.examine_text: A rustic wooden bench, weathered by the elements. It's a comfortable place to sit and overlook the hard work done in the garden.

Watering Can.name: Watering Can
Watering Can.examine_text: A classic watering can made of worn metal. This humble tool carries water to the thirsty plants.

locations.name: Courtyard Exterior
locations.description: Paths as well as vines, fountains, and sitting areas are decoratively placed through out the courtyard. It's a place where people are welcome and arrive to enter the castle of the court.
locations.background: Centuries old but maintained to look as good as it ever has. It's suppose to be a place to make the people of the kingdom feel like their king is a servant to them not them being servants to a king. People gather and arrive here to see the king, petition the court or just meet with friends who live or work at the castle.

travel_descriptions.west: Traveling west leads to the training fields, a vast expanse of dry grassland dotted with various training paraphernalia where warriors and noblemen hone their skills.
travel_descriptions.south: Heading south, you enter the stone-paved courtyard. Its tranquil atmosphere is further enhanced by beautiful flowers, stone statues, and the sound of trickling water from various fountains.
travel_descriptions.east: Moving eastward, the hidden garden unveils itself. Overgrown yet still breathtaking in its chaotic beauty, the sight of roses and the statue of a woman evokes a sense of mystical serenity.

Garden Fountain.name: Garden Fountain
Garden Fountain.description: A grand, intricately detailed stone fountain
Garden Fountain.examine_text: Upon closer inspection, the fountain is laced with faint carvings of mythical creatures. Water bubbles gently from the mouth of a stone lion at the fountain's heart, creating a soothing ambiance.

Stone Bench.name: Stone Bench
Stone Bench.description: A carved stone bench, perfect for sitting and gazing at the palace.
Stone Bench.examine_text: Examining the stone bench reveals delicate etchings of a story, perhaps an old legend from the kingdom's past. Slightly cold to the touch but comfortable nonetheless.

Royal Sigil.name: Royal Sigil
Royal Sigil.description: The kingdom's royal sigil, plated with gold.
Royal Sigil.examine_text: The sigil is meticulously crafted, featuring the arms of the royal family. The gold plating catches your eye, reflecting the sunlight in a dazzling array of colors.

Apple Tree.name: Apple Tree
Apple Tree.description: A lofty apple tree laden with ripe fruit
Apple Tree.examine_text: The apple tree is bursting with vibrant-apple green leaves and crisp red apples. Perhaps they are here for the palace folks to enjoy a fresh fruit now and then.

locations.name: Laundry Lines
locations.description: The laundry lines extend for meters. 6 rows of lines go from north to south. The area is filled with people putting their clothes to dry. All the lines are in an opening of trees that the sun hits perfectly to help dry. To the right you can see a stream through the tree where people go to wash their clothes before they hang them to dry.
locations.background: The laundry lines were set up so the villagers could have a good place to dry their laundry next to a river. They used to hang them at home but as there were times the sun wouldn't hit them directly it became a bad way to manage so instead they came together to get a place where everyone could dry.

travel_descriptions.up: Walking from the laundry lines you will enter the Palace Garden, a breath-taking transition from the simplicity of the laundry lines to an extravagant display of nature carefully crafted by the finest gardeners.
travel_descriptions.west: Heading west from the laundry lines takes you to the Courtyard. A short walk will have you leaving behind the common simplicity of the laundry lines to the impressive stone architecture and well-manicured flora of the Courtyard.

Clothespins.name: Clothespins
Clothespins.examine_text: These are small, simple wooden clothespins, used by the villagers to hang their clothes on the lines. They are worn with use but still sturdy.

Laundry Baskets.name: Laundry Baskets
Laundry Baskets.description: Several hand-woven laundry baskets full of clothes
Laundry Baskets.examine_text: These baskets are carefully crafted from local plants, filled with various clothes, waiting to be washed or already clean.

Drying Clothes.name: Drying Clothes
Drying Clothes.description: An assortment of colorful clothes hanging and drying in the sun
Drying Clothes.examine_text: The drying clothes are of multiple colours and designs suggesting the diverse clothing styles of the villagers. They are damp and fluttering in the breeze.

Washing Stones.name: Washing Stones
Washing Stones.description: Flat stones once used for washing clothes
Washing Stones.examine_text: The stones are smooth and worn from years of use. They are situated near the stream for easy access to water

locations.name: Courtyard
locations.description: Hand carved stone surround the courtyard made by the most skilled masons with their impervious designs. Its large and quiet with hanging moss, and several beds of flowers.
locations.background: The king loved to stroll through the courtyard to think on his reign. The king will often bring subjects to walk and talk about business and needs of his people.

travel_descriptions.north: Walking north from the Courtyard you are enveloped by the lush greenery and fragrance of the Garden, a sight that is sure to attract artists and royals alike.
travel_descriptions.east: Heading east from the Courtyard, your footsteps take you to the bustling Training Fields, echoing with the clangs of steel and shouts of diligent trainees.
travel_descriptions.south: A trek towards the south brings you to the grandeur of the Main Castle Doors, their golden shimmer a vibrant testament to the palace's affluent past.

Stone Bench.name: Stone Bench
Stone Bench.description: A hand-carved stone bench, cool to touch.
Stone Bench.examine_text: The bench is intricately designed by the skilled masons. It's smooth, cool, and provides a resting place for the people who wander in the courtyard.

Hanging Moss.name: Hanging Moss
Hanging Moss.description: Green moss hanging around the courtyard.
Hanging Moss.examine_text: This moss is hanging from the surrounding trees, giving this palace courtyard a serene and relaxing ambiance.

Flower Bed.name: Flower Bed
Flower Bed.examine_text: The flowers are in full bloom, their inviting colors and scent give the courtyard a vibrant and lively feel.

locations.name: Royal Gardens
locations.description: Lined with rose bushes that look as if they have been watered by the God's, the Royal Gardens is a beauty to behold. An intricate labyrinth made of shrubs is at the center ending with a fountain. There are various benches on the sides of the rose bushes and a small lake in the back drop.
locations.background: The Royal Gardens were conceptualized by the late great Queen. She wanted a beautiful promenade to walk her dogs and converse with her bed maids about court gossip. It was originally commissioned to be 1/2 an acre but has been expanded as time has gone on.

travel_descriptions.east: Walking east from the Royal Gardens, the sight of gold coated Main Castle Doors gets larger, the engraved images of past kings and queens becoming clearer with each step. The faint metallic scent fills the air as one reaches the doors.
travel_descriptions.north: Towards the north, leaving behind the rose bushes, the path leads you to the stone patio of the Courtyard. The colorful flowers from hedges and aroma of roses take you to an entirely different world. The stone benches and statues become noticeable as you move closer.

Royal Rose Bush.name: Royal Rose Bush
Royal Rose Bush.description: An extremely beautiful bush studded with roses in various shades of red.
Royal Rose Bush.examine_text: On close inspection, the roses on the bush are in full bloom and their petals are velvety and soft. They give off a delightful fragrance that fills the air.

Garden Bench.name: Garden Bench
Garden Bench.description: Made of exquisitely carved wood, this bench has a delicate charm.
Garden Bench.examine_text: The bench is worn smooth from the wind and weather but still maintains its sturdy structure. A beautiful carving of the palace is etched on its back support.

Fountain.name: Fountain
Fountain.description: Situated at the center of the labyrinth, this fountain is a characterful masterpiece.
Fountain.examine_text: Composed of white marble and adorned with elegant sculptures, the fountain trickles with pure, crystal-clear water. A depiction of the late queen graces the highest point of the structure.

Labyrinth Bush.name: Labyrinth Bush
Labyrinth Bush.description: Shrubs shaped into walls for the labyrinth, adding an air of mystery to the garden.
Labyrinth Bush.examine_text: The thick shrubs are masterfully cut and maintained in a perfect network of woven paths. Closer look reveals tiny birds and insects taking refuge in their lush greenery.

locations.name: Courtyard
locations.description: An area with a beautiful garden in center surrounded by stone walls with entrances to different parts of the palace.  There's statues of mythological figures in different corners of the courtyard.
locations.background: This is an area where members of the royal family entertain guests.  The inhabitants of the palace may also use this area to walk among a garden and enjoy the sunlight.

travel_descriptions.north: Walking towards the north, the aroma of different types of flowers become stronger which aligns the path to the garden.
travel_descriptions.east: Heading east, you'll cross a long field with mowed grass which leads to the training fields--you'll hear the clashing of swords and archery targets being hit.
travel_descriptions.south: Moving southwards, you'll approach brilliant gold doors that lead to the royal castle--you can hear faint sounds of people and animals from inside the castle.

Statue.name: Statue
Statue.description: A towering stone statue located at the corner of the courtyard.
Statue.examine_text: Close inspection reveals it to be a figure from Greek mythology, expertly sculpted with brilliantly detailed facial expressions and garment folds.

Fountain.name: Fountain
Fountain.description: A large, ornate fountain occupies the center of the courtyard.
Fountain.examine_text: The water in the fountain is crystal clear, and it cascades softly from the top tier into the basin below. The stonework is ornate and the edges of the fountain are adorned with intricate sculpted seashells.

Flower.name: Flower
Flower.description: A brightly-colored flower growing in the garden.
Flower.examine_text: The petals look velvet-soft and have an iridescent sheen that catches the sunlight. The flower has a sweet, intoxicating scent.

Bench.name: Bench
Bench.description: A stone bench rests along the path near the garden.
Bench.examine_text: The bench, crafted from smooth marble, provides a comfortable place to sit and enjoy the atmosphere of the courtyard.

locations.name: Hidden Garden
locations.description: There are plenty of roses, wilted, but still red.  A large statue of a beautiful woman stands in the middle, ivy growing around her.  She seems very kind in her expression.  It seems as though she may be buried underneath.  There is an overgrown mess of plants that form an archway that she is staring at.
locations.background: This is where the King buried the love of his life who died in childbirth.  She was very fond of dancing.  The king has not visited in some time and it is forbidden for others.

travel_descriptions.west: Exiting the Hidden Garden to the west, you cross the somewhat unruly greenery and pass under the overgrown archway, letting your fingers gently brush against the cold stone statue one last time. Leaving this silent memorial behind, you then step onto a cobblestone path leading to the Courtyard Exterior, where life blooms in stark contrast.

Rose.name: Rose
Rose.description: A vibrant red flower, although somewhat wilted.
Rose.examine_text: This rose, despite its wilting state, seems to pack a lot of life. Its radiant redness speaks volumes of the love once treasured in this place.

Statue.name: Statue
Statue.description: A large statue of a beautiful woman wrapped in ivy.
Statue.examine_text: This majestic marble statue of a woman holds an expression of kindness. It is wrapped in ivy, suggesting a sense of abandonment and yet, somehow, the lovely woman it replicates seems unfazed.

Overgrown Archway.name: Overgrown Archway
Overgrown Archway.description: An archway concealed by the wild growth of plants.
Overgrown Archway.examine_text: The archway, made up of twisted roots and branches, seems to be a portal to another world. One step inside, there might not be any turning back...
